name: Kalamity Kitchen
description:
During the lunch rush, a pizza chef must fulfil all customer orders within a certain timeframe.

However, the chef gets struck with a buff or a nerf every 10 seconds in this magical and somewhat cursed kitchen, either raising the difficulty of the objective or granting temporary aid.

  • Player/Character: A Pizzaiolo (A Pizzaiolo is a chef who specializes in making pizzas and has been trained to make authentic, Italian-style pizzas.)
  • Objective/Goal: To fulfil all of the customer orders within a reasonable timeline.
  • Obstacle/s: Every 10 seconds, the player is hit with either a buff or a nerf, raising the objective's difficulty or providing temporary assistance.
